title: cifti-label-to-roi
description:
Make a cifti label into an roi.

For each map in <label-in>, a map is created in <scalar-out> where all locations labeled with <label-name> or with a key of <label-key> are given a value of 1, and all other locations are given 0.  Exactly one of -name and -key must be specified.  Specify -map to use only one map from <label-in>.

opt_name_label_name.title: opt_name_label_name
opt_name_label_name.description: select label by name: the label name that you want an roi of

opt_key_label_key.title: opt_key_label_key
opt_key_label_key.description: select label by key: the label key that you want an roi of

opt_map_map.title: opt_map_map
opt_map_map.description: select a single label map to use: the map number or name
